name: Bolty
description:
Welcome !

I would love to present my game idea and encourage people to leave feedback so that I could make changes to the game as I am still working on it.

This is an early stage of the game with  few levels for people to try out. It is very important for me to hear what you have to say about this game and whether continue as it is or not.

Screenshots I have attached show the theme which is quite minimalist, however its adding uniqueness to the game.

It is a simple, nevertheless very unique platformer where you will find yourself developing a way to complete level using randomly selected blocks.

The collection of those will expand with your progression.

Mechanics that allow players to express their way of completing the game.

Estimated play time of this demo:   30 minutes.

Follow me on Instagram !

https://www.instagram.com/daleski_x/

Credits

JomelleJager

yottasounds
